constantValues: Product line item in a quote. The details include such information as product ID, description, quantity, and cost.

members.name: quoteDetailId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the product line item in the quote.

members.description: Unique identifier of the product line item in the quote.

members.name: baseAmount

constantValues: Shows the total price of the quote product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

members.description: Shows the total price of the quote product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: baseAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the quote product, such as manufacturing details or acceptable substitutions.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the quote product, such as manufacturing details or acceptable substitutions.

members.name: extendedAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due for the quote product, based on the sum of the unit price, quantity, discounts ,and tax.

members.description: Shows the total amount due for the quote product, based on the sum of the unit price, quantity, discounts ,and tax.

members.name: extendedAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Extended Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Extended Amount in base currency.

members.name: isPriceOverridden

constantValues: Select whether the price per unit is fixed at the value in the specified price list or can be overridden by users who have edit rights to the quote product.

members.description: Select whether the price per unit is fixed at the value in the specified price list or can be overridden by users who have edit rights to the quote product.

members.name: isProductOverridden

constantValues: Select whether the product exists in the Microsoft Dynamics 365 product catalog or is a write-in product specific to the quote.

members.description: Select whether the product exists in the Microsoft Dynamics 365 product catalog or is a write-in product specific to the quote.

members.name: lineItemNumber

constantValues: Type the line item number for the quote product to easily identify the product in the quote and make sure it's listed in the correct order.

members.description: Type the line item number for the quote product to easily identify the product in the quote and make sure it's listed in the correct order.

members.name: manualDiscountAmount

constantValues: Type the manual discount amount for the quote product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total on the quote.

members.description: Type the manual discount amount for the quote product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total on the quote.

members.name: manualDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Manual Discount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Manual Discount in base currency.

constantValues: Choose the parent bundle associated with this product

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the parent bundle associated with this product

constantValues: Unique identifier of the product line item association with bundle in the quote

constantValues: Type the price per unit of the quote product. The default is to the value in the price list specified on the quote for existing products.

constantValues: Type a name or description to identify the type of write-in product included in the quote.

members.description: Type a name or description to identify the type of write-in product included in the quote.

constantValues: Calculated field that will be populated by name and description of the product.

members.description: Calculated field that will be populated by name and description of the product.
